testCase.name: Valid builtin function calls produce no errors
testCase.description: Functions with correct parameter count should not generate warnings

testCase.name: Invalid parameter count generates warnings
testCase.description: Functions with wrong parameter count should generate warnings

testCase.name: Unknown functions generate errors
testCase.description: Unknown function calls should generate undefined symbol errors

testCase.name: Builtin functions appear in completion
testCase.description: Builtin functions should be available in completion
